DOC.brief_summary: This study aims at combining inspiration breath-hold myocardial perfusion SPECT with coronary CT angiography.
DOC.criteria: Referral for cardiac hybrid SPECT/CCTA Male and female subjects 18 years of age or older Written informed consent by the participant after information about the project Contraindications for coronary CT angiography (including renal failure with a GFR <30ml/min/1.73m2, allergies to iodinated contrast agents) Pregnancy or breastfeeding Previous coronary revascularisation Inability to follow the examination procedure (e.g. due to language barriers, severe mental disease etc
